content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position(-0.23684210526315788, 2.710526315789474)
Consists of the following entities:
- Steam engine (position not specified)
- Boiler (position not specified)
- Offshore pump (position not specified)

### Copper plate mine at position(0.0, 0.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position not specified) and a furnace at position(0.0, 0.0)
  
### Iron plate mine at position(5.0, 5.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position not specified) and a furnace at position(5.0, 5.0)

### Lab at position(2.5, 1.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Lab (position 2.5, 1.5)

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors due to lack of ingredients
- Ensure that furnaces have the necessary ingredients to operate. Check the inventory and supply chain to avoid running out of materials.

### Errors related to power supply
- Ensure that the lab and other entities requiring power are connected to an active electricity network. Check the connections and power sources.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.

### Errors when placing entities too far away
- Move closer to the target position before attempting to place an entity. The maximum placement distance is 10 tiles.
